sectionHeading: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday August 9 at 4:00 p.m.

location: The ferry is closed for maintenance.  It will reopen from 6 a.m. to 9 a.m. on Thursday August 10.
The ferry will close at 9 a.m. on Thursday August 10 for continued maintenance.
Officials expect to reopen on Friday August 11 on a regular schedule.
